feature.label: QC Features
feature.description: This feature contains a collection of tools for QC analysis.
feature.copyright: The copyright of the contained tools belongs to the original authors. Please check the corresponding web- sites for details. FastQC = https://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/fastqc/ MultiQC = http://multiqc.info/ Krona = https://github.com/marbl/Krona/wiki/KronaTools QualiMap = http://qualimap.bioinfo.cipf.es/doc_html/analysis.html QUAST = http://quast.bioinf.spbau.ru/manual.html
